Game.Name: Bejeweled Twist
Game.Plot: A brilliant new spin on the world’s #1 puzzle game! Spin, match, explode... wow! It’s a brilliant new way to play! Spin and match explosive gems for shockwaves of fun in this quick-play version of the award-winning PopCap® game. Rotate jewels to set up electrifying combos, outwit obstacles like Locks and Bombs, and create high-voltage Flame and Lightning gems. Play the intensely fun Classic mode or take on a friend in the exclusive Nintendo DS Battle mode! No matter how you play, you’ll find endless ways to win!!
